domino_project

Interface DominoLine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDominoLine, CardinalDominoLine

    public interface DominoLine
    This interface represents a Line of Tiles on which the tiles are put by players and bot at a Domino Game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTileAtTheEnd(Tile tile)
      Adds a Tile at the End of the DominoLine
      void addTileOnBeginning(Tile tile)
      Adds a Tile on the beginning of The Dominoline
      void Clear()
      Clears(removes all elements) the DominoLine so it can be updated with the next added elements.
      short fitsAtTheEnd(Tile tile)
      Checks if the given tile fits at the End of the line.
      short fitsOnBeginning(Tile tile)
      Checks if the given tile fits on the Beggining of the line.
      SetOfTiles getSetOfTiles()
      Gets the DominoLine returned.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if this DominoLine contains no elements.

    • Method Detail

        void addTileOnBeginning(Tile tile)
        Adds a Tile on the beginning of The Dominoline

        tile - Tile to be added

      • addTileAtTheEnd

        void addTileAtTheEnd(Tile tile)
        Adds a Tile at the End of the DominoLine
        Parameters:
        tile - , a tile

      • fitsOnBeginning

        short fitsOnBeginning(Tile tile)
        Checks if the given tile fits on the Beggining of the line. It is supposed that if the line is empty, every tile fits the line. * "matches" depends on the rules of each version of DominoGames
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be checked
        Returns:
        1:if 1st tile matches the first tile in DominoLine (or line is empty) 2:if 2nd tile matches the first tile in DominoLine 3:if the first tile in DominoLine doesn't match any side of the tile

      • fitsAtTheEnd

        short fitsAtTheEnd(Tile tile)
        Checks if the given tile fits at the End of the line. "matches" depends on the rules of each version of DominoGames
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be checked
        Returns:
        1:if 1st Tile matches the second tile (or line is empty) 2:if 2nd Tile matches the second tile 3:if the second tile doesn't match any side of the Tile

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if this DominoLine contains no elements.
        Returns:
        true if this DominoLine contains no elements

      • getSetOfTiles

        SetOfTiles getSetOfTiles()
        Gets the DominoLine returned.
        Returns:
        A SetOfTiles representing the DominoLine.

      • Clear

        void Clear()
        Clears(removes all elements) the DominoLine so it can be updated with the next added elements.
